name: Soccer Manager Arena
description:
Collect player cards. Go head-to-head in the Arena in real-time football games!

BUILD YOUR DECK

Collect 106 different player cards to strengthen your deck and become an unbeatable Arena manager. Mix and match as much as you like with 3 different types of Player Cards - Good, Superb and Elite, giving you a massive choice of combinations.

CREATE YOUR STRATEGY

Having a powerful deck is one thing but knowing how to use your cards is how you win matches. Each player card has it’s own set of attributes and up to two special abilities. Select from 4 different formations. Meaning you can choose a different strategy each game.

LIVE REAL-TIME MATCHES

Use your players in a real-time matches against random opponents or friends and develop your skills to become a Champion!

BATTLE IN YOUR ARENA

As you win matches, you will receive trophies allowing you to progress up the rankings. Unlocking new levels lets you play in different types of iconic, city based Arenas and discover new players.

FEATURES

  • Compete in real-time matches with managers from across the world.
  • Develop your team by unlocking card packs.
  • Learn from other Arena managers on Arena TV!
  • Compete in different types of football Arenas.
  • Create an Arena Club and help develop each other’s team.
  • Play against friends.

Get ready to enter the Arena!
